get.description: The purpose of this route is to provide a concise collection of meta data primarily for multilingual apps. It will return an array of books with metadata. You can query additional book names by including the `language_codes` param. `language_codes` is simply an array of ISO639-3 codes deliminated by a `|` bar character. Including a param of `spa|eng` will return translations for both Spanish and English. If the system is unable to find the bible_id provided it will return all books by default and the `bible` field will be set to an empty string.
